short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to support translation of web-based platforms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed to be used with Baton Simulations's Digital Adoption Solution (DAS) for SAP Ariba.

FEATURES

-Translation: On-the-fly translation for an international audience.
